pages.text: $(thing)Reaction crafting/$ gives a way to create more components like $(item)Conduits/$ and $(item)Condensers/$, as well as portable elements in the form of $(l:basic/shard)Shards/$

To start $(thing)reaction crafting/$, make an $(thing)air/$+$(thing)earth/$ or $(thing)fire/$+$(thing)water/$ reaction in the catalyst, and a magic circle will appear. The rate it spins depends on how much charge it has. More reactions will give it more charge, but the higher the charge, the quicker it will decay.
